dont seed this and find another torrent.

eztv - sure some of us are fans of future codecs such as h.264 and .mkv file containers, but right now the simple fact is that the majority of devices that just play media dont handle these things. people want something that just plays easy across a broad range of things, their phone/xbox/tablet/ps3/dvdplayer/tv, and right now that format is still, undeniably, the xvid/avi combo.

I got no problems whatsoever, excellent quality for such a small filesize! Thanks for the upload.

@ people having issues with the file: download K-lite codec pack (full), install everything, done. You can now play every type of file, in all media players.
